[`class func fieldEditor() -> Self`](/documentation/appkit/nstextview/fieldeditor())[`var textContainer: NSTextContainer?`](/documentation/appkit/nstextview/textcontainer)The receiver’s text container.[`func replaceTextContainer(NSTextContainer)`](/documentation/appkit/nstextview/replacetextcontainer(_:))Replaces the text container for the group of text system objects containing the receiver, keeping the association between the receiver and its layout manager intact.[`var textContainerInset: NSSize`](/documentation/appkit/nstextview/textcontainerinset)The empty space the receiver leaves around its associated text container.[`var textContainerOrigin: NSPoint`](/documentation/appkit/nstextview/textcontainerorigin)The origin of the receiver’s text container.[`func invalidateTextContainerOrigin()`](/documentation/appkit/nstextview/invalidatetextcontainerorigin())Invalidates the calculated origin of the text container.[`var textLayoutManager: NSTextLayoutManager?`](/documentation/appkit/nstextview/textlayoutmanager)The manager that lays out text for the receiver’s text container.[`var layoutManager: NSLayoutManager?`](/documentation/appkit/nstextview/layoutmanager)The layout manager that lays out text for the receiver’s text container.[`var textContentStorage: NSTextContentStorage?`](/documentation/appkit/nstextview/textcontentstorage)The receiver’s text storage object.[`var textStorage: NSTextStorage?`](/documentation/appkit/nstextview/textstorage)The receiver’s text storage object.
